props.avatar: Used to set minimum tile height on a single-line list item
props.dense: Lowers max height of list tiles
props.expand: Will only collapse when explicitly closed
props.flat: Remove the highlighted background on active `v-list-item`s
props.group: Assign a route namespace. Accepts a string or regexp for determining active state
props.inactive: If set, the list tile will not be rendered as a link even if it has to/href prop or @click handler
props.link: Applies `v-list-item` hover styles. Useful when using the item as an _activator_.
props.nav: An alternative styling that reduces `v-list-item` width and rounds the corners. Typically used with **[v-navigation-drawer](/components/navigation-drawers)**
props.noAction: Removes left padding assigned for action icons from group items
props.shaped: Provides an alternative active style for `v-list-item`.
props.subGroup: Designate the component as nested list group
props.subheader: Removes top padding. Used when previous sibling is a header
props.threeLine: Increases list-item height for three lines. This prop uses [line-clamp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-line-clamp) and is not supported in all browsers.
props.twoLine: Increases list-item height for two lines. This prop uses [line-clamp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-line-clamp) and is not supported in all browsers.
